*Wrath is hit by several shots but jumps behind a rock. Stingtra pulls the
sword out of her arm and swings it at Wrath chopping his left hand off.
Wrath shoots shoulder cannon shots at Stingtra but she then jumps behind the
rock with Shredder, avoiding the shots. Wrath starts shooting full blast at
the rock*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 23, 2000 10:47 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder swears under his breath as one Wrath's shots hits him in the
> shoulder, nearly flipping him backwards. He growls, rolling to the side to
> evade several more shots, some hitting him in the leg.
>
> He comes to a crouch behind a rock, firing at Wrath with both chainguns.
